definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (witness-pile) name of pile of stones erected by Jacob and his company (Kit:Gesch. 129; by Laban We Di) Ge 31:47, Ge 31:48 (v. [[גַּל]]

definitions.title: 1 c
definitions.body: ) appar. intended to explain [[גִּלְעָד]] q.v.; Di conj. also (as name of altar) Jos 22:34 (cf. SyrVer).
